mapper.select: SELECT tb.BOARD_ID, tb.USER_ID, tb.BOARD_TITLE, tb.BOARD_CONTENT, tb.CREATED_AT, tb.UPDATED_AT, tb.BOARD_HITS, tu.USER_NAME, tu.USER_ACCOUNT FROM tb_board tb left outer join tb_user tu /* 사용자정보는 있으면 보여주고 없으면 null */ on tu.user_id = tb.user_id WHERE tb.BOARD_ID = #{boardId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TB_COMMENT (BOARD_ID, COMMENT_WRITER, COMMENT_CONTENT, CREATED_AT, UPDATED_AT) VALUES (#{boardId}, #{commentWriter}, #{commentContent}, NOW(), NOW())
mapper.select: SELECT TC.COMMENT_ID, TC.BOARD_ID, TC.COMMENT_WRITER, TC.COMMENT_CONTENT, TC.CREATED_AT, TC.UPDATED_AT, TU.USER_ID, TU.USER_NAME, TU.USER_ACCOUNT FROM TB_COMMENT TC INNER JOIN TB_BOARD TB ON TB.USER_ID = TC.COMMENT_WRITER INNER JOIN TB_USER TU ON TU.USER_ID = TC.COMMENT_WRITER WHERE tb.BOARD_ID = #{BOARD_ID}
SELECT * FROM tb_board WHERE BOARD_TITLE LIKE CONCAT('%',#{keyword},'%')
SELECT * FROM tb_board WHERE BOARD_CONTENT LIKE CONCAT('%',#{keyword},'%')
